projects.title: Ping Pong
projects.description: Built with React Native, 'PingPong' is a basic social media app designed to kill your groupchat. Sign up, add your friends, and send a 'ping' with your current location to let your friends know what you're up to! Completed as my final project at Dev Academy Aoateroa
projects.description2: Built with React Native and redux.js for the front-end

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.description: Inspired by passwordgenerator.net a simple front end app built in react.js for generating secure passwords. Choose your password length and select the types of characters (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols). See how long your password will take to crack!
projects.description2: Built with react.js with a node.js server
